alert.note: Alert for Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 12 at 3:13PM AKST until December 12 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...LONG DURATION HEAVY SNOW EVENT FOR THE KLONDIKE HIGHWAY NEAR WHITE PASS... A wave of moisture is moving through the northern panhandle Tuesday. With cold air in place, moderate to heavy snow is expected to continue through late Tuesday evening near White Pass. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy wet snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Klondike Highway. * WHEN...Until 9 PM AKST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery conditions. Heavy wet snow will be difficult to manage due to high water content.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water with you in case of an emergency. People are urged to prepare their property before the onset of winter weather. For the latest road conditions, where available, call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
